original_text: from their descendants who were left after them in the land, whom the people of Israel had not destroyed—these Solomon drafted as forced labor, and so they are to this day.
korean_text: 곧 이스라엘 자손이 다 멸하지 않았으므로 그 땅에 남아 있는 그들의 자손들을 솔로몬이 역꾼으로 삼아 오늘에 이르렀으되

sentences.original_text: from their descendants who were left after them in the land
whom the people of Israel had not destroyed
these Solomon drafted as forced labor
and so they are to this day
